items.content_html: Contains lightweight substitutes for SAP applications to ease the development and testing of extension and integration scenarios. In conjunction with SAP Cloud Platform, Kyma runtime, the efficient implementation of application extensions is supported without the need for real SAP applications being accessible during development.
items.title: SAP-samples/xf-application-mocks: Contains lightweight substitutes for SAP applications to ease the development and testing of extension and integration scenarios. In conjunction with SAP Cloud Platform, Kyma runtime, the efficient implementation of application extensions is supported without the need for real SAP applications being accessible during development.
